content.rendered: [vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title=”Is the demo content included?”][vc_column_text]Yes, you can import the whole demo content using our awesome one-click demo importer feature after installing the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Is it easy to install?”][vc_column_text]Yes! All you need is a fresh and clean WordPress installation and follow the short video tutorial included in the doc and you’re good to go.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Can I easily change colors?”][vc_column_text]Yes, you can change the main appearance of your website and see the changes instantly in the live preview.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_accordion][vc_accordion_tab title=”Is the demo content included?”][vc_column_text]Yes, you can import the whole demo content using our awesome one-click demo importer feature after installing the theme.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Is it easy to install?”][vc_column_text]Yes! All you need is a fresh and clean WordPress installation and follow the short video tutorial included in the doc and you’re good to go.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][vc_accordion_tab title=”Can I easily change colors?”][vc_column_text]Yes, you can change the main appearance of your website and see the changes instantly in the live preview.[/vc_column_text][/vc_accordion_tab][/vc_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”” background_type=”image” background_color=”lightergrey” shift_y=”0″][vc_column][vc_toggle h4=”Is the demo content included?”]Yes, you can import the whole demo content using our awesome one-click demo importer feature after installing the theme.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle h4=”Is it easy to install?”]Yes! All you need is a fresh and clean WordPress installation and follow the short video tutorial included in the doc and you’re good to go.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle h4=”Can I easily change colors?”]Yes, you can change the main appearance of your website and see the changes instantly in the live preview.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle h4=”Can I get help to install and use the theme?”]Yes, 6 months premium support are included in your theme purchase.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][/vc_row]
